task: Carry original documents and their self-attested photocopies
Check Document Advisor on website to know the documents required at PSK
Only applicant is allowed inside the PSK, except for exceptions
Be alert and watch the token display screens to know the counter at which your application will be processed
Login to Passport Portal to download acknowledgement slip after your visit to PSK
Provide feedback at the exit counter
Co-operate with security staff for frisking before entry in PSK
Take care of your belongings inside the PSK
Keep your mobile in silent mode inside PSK
Do not allow video / photography inside PSK
Pay balance fee (if applicable) after editing the submitted form in cash at the Passport Seva Kendra
